meanings.sent1: The teamer passed the ball to their teammate.
meanings.sent2: The teamer was excited to be part of the winning team.
meanings.sent3: The teamer accidentally wore mismatched socks to the game.
meanings.sent4: In the puzzle of life, each teamer is a unique piece.
meanings.sent5: The teamer's dedication to the team was truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: A person who is part of a group working together towards a common goal.
meanings.sent1: Every teamer contributed their skills to the project.
meanings.sent2: The teamer felt proud of the team's accomplishment.
meanings.sent3: The teamer brought homemade cookies to boost team morale.
meanings.sent4: Like a bee in a hive, each teamer has a role to play.
meanings.sent5: The teamer's positive attitude lifted the whole team up.
